entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
